casebody.data:
State
v.
Thomas Craig Campbell 252PA14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 10, 2016 Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Campbell, Thomas Craig. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of August 2016 by Defendant to Strike Section D of the State's Brief as Outside the Scope of this Court's Special Order Allowing the State's Petition for Discretionary Review in Part and Denying the State's Petition for Discretionary Review in Part:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of August 2016."
